dublin_core.dcvalue: Purpose In this introduction the four members of the scientific committee for the Third International Meeting on Internet and Audiology describe the meeting that took place at the University of Louisville on July 27 28 2017 Method This special issue with a decidedly clinical focus includes 14 articles that arose from presentations given at the Third International Meeting on Internet and Audiology All touch upon the theme of innovation as it pertains to teleaudiology and mobile health mHealth application of Big Data to audiology and ethics of internet and telemedicine Conclusion Innovations in teleaudiology mHealth and Internet based audiology are developing at a rapid pace and thus research in the field must continue We invite readers to the next International Meeting on Internet and Audiology that will take place in Southampton England June 17 18 2019
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-08T14:29:05Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2-11-30
Internet and Audiology: A Review of the Third International Meeting.
